page.title: 03RAPHAEL'S PARK/ROMFORD G.C.
page.content: Raphael's Park is situated between Main Road and Romford Golf Course. It was opened in 1935 and is very popular with old people, who can often be seen walking their dogs, and the young, who play on the fields and tennis courts. Particularly popular with all age groups is the park's beautiful lake with it's wild life and places to fish. During the fishing season, the banks of this gleaming lake are packed with keen fishermen out for their daily catch. Romford Golf Course boarders the Park and is a private Golf Club. It is famous for it's great number of bunkers - 365, one for every day of the year.
